channel.title: Progletariat
channel.description: Progletariat /ˌproʊglɪˈtɛəriːət/: A term used to describe the class of wage-earners (especially programmers) in a capitalist society whose only possession of any perceived value is their labour-power (their ability to code).

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: If you've much experience with other static site generators like Octopress or Jekyll most of this should be fairly familiar, if not, hopefully it won't be too difficult to pick up.

item.title: Hello, FsBlog!
item.description: FsBlog aims to be a blog-aware static site generator, mostly built in F# for .NET and Mono developers.
